main event: An observation of a bright light that exploded in the sky, lasting for 5-10 seconds.
interesting points: The object moved across the southern sky from right to left,The light emitted a short trail of sparks or debris that was brighter than the object itself,Some witnesses described the explosion as a shower of sparks akin to a sky rocket,The light was seen by personnel on a merchant vessel named Dunkirk,The observation was compared to a shooting star.
witness description: personnel on a merchant vessel and others observing in the area
